Description: Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars!!! Shipping to the lower 48 states FedEx,no PO Boxes. I will not ship anywhere else. Most deliveries will require a signature. Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars at my ebay store "Axes Bold As Love Guitars". Here is a very cool Epiphone by Gibson SG G310 in Gloss Black finish with some nice upgrades. The guitar is in great condition with only one real nick on the top edge that has been touched up, a few very small nicks and mild surface scratches. I did a quick set up to get some nice low action going on. The guitar features Locking tuners . The pickups are Hot Black/Cream Zebras .They meter about 8k-neck,15k-bridge. I also upgraded the capacitors with nice .022uf Mallory style axial film caps. So the good news is the guitar plays and sounds great. Guitar plays and sounds way better than stock. I started playing AC/DC as soon as I plugged it in . These pickups sound great in this guitar. Guitar looks,plays,and sounds great. Please study the pictures to get a better idea. I only ship fully insured to the lower 48 states,and nowhere else. I describe all guitars to the best of my abilities.I don't take every guitar apart to check every freaking screw.I disclose all pimples just so there are no misunderstandings.All guitars are sold as is. Insurance is included in my shipping and handling charges.I will not ship out of the U.S. My feedback is public record,and I aim to keep it good. I will no longer do local pickups period. Make sure to look at all pictures carefully,ask all question before you bid! All sales are final,and there will be no refunds, or returns unless you can prove an item was grossly misrepresented. Consider this a contract if you bid. Sorry it has to be like that,blame the clever scam artist that spend all their time trying to beat somebody,instead of working. Most deliveries will require adult signature.
